ygData.subject: Re: Raid Guide
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sometimes I think maybe ... spell messages. So maybe ... Or have those things ... way. People don t listen because they don t want to listen, plain and
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Su" <suceress@...>
>
> The bit about people not listening is a big problem.
Sometimes I think maybe
> people are trying to listen but miss things bc of
spell messages. So maybe
> have people turn off spell messages. And others hits.
Or have those things
> put in a seperate chat window and pushed out of the
way.

People don't listen because they don't want to listen,
plain and simple. It is the biggest problem in raiding,
by far.

The best way to get attention and keep attention is to
boot people from raids that don't listen. Have a person
wandering off after repeated tells to stay in camp, TL
him/her out. It's the easiest way to get their
attention.
